name: ifpnim2

stmt.origin: xchnxbir(wi(w0, w1), wif(w1, wn(w1), w0), wif(w1, w1, wn(w0)))
stmt.pretty: xchnxbir((w0 → w1), if(w1, ¬ w1, w0), if(w1, w1, ¬ w0))

body.origin:
|- wb(wn(wi(w0, w1)), wif(w1, wn(w1), w0))
-| wb(wn(wif(w1, w1, wn(w0))), wif(w1, wn(w1), w0))
-| wb(wi(w0, w1), wif(w1, w1, wn(w0)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wn(wi(w0, w1)), wif(w1, wn(w1), w0))
-| wb(wn(wif(w1, w1, wn(w0))), wif(w1, wn(w1), w0))
-| wb(wi(w0, w1), wif(w1, w1, wn(w0)))

body.origin: |- wb(wn(wif(w1, w1, wn(w0))), wif(w1, wn(w1), w0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wn(wi(w0, w1)), wif(w1, wn(w1), w0))
-| wb(wi(w0, w1), wif(w1, w1, wn(w0)))

comment: Restate negated implication as conditional logic operator. (Contributed by RP, 25-Apr-2020.)
